solution_line_template: The total cost for the flour is {flour_boxes} x ${flour_price_per_box} = $<<{flour_boxes}*{flour_price_per_box}={flour_total}>>{flour_total}.
The total cost of the tray of eggs is {egg_trays} x ${egg_price_per_tray} = $<<{egg_trays}*{egg_price_per_tray}={eggs_total}>>{eggs_total}.
The total cost for the liter of milk is {milk_liters} x ${milk_price_per_liter} = $<<{milk_liters}*{milk_price_per_liter}={milk_total}>>{milk_total}.
The total cost for the box of baking soda is {baking_soda_boxes} x ${baking_soda_price_per_box} = $<<{baking_soda_boxes}*{baking_soda_price_per_box}={baking_soda_total}>>{baking_soda_total}.

Therefore, the total cost for all the ingredients is ${flour_total} + ${eggs_total} + ${milk_total} + ${baking_soda_total} = $<<{flour_total}+{eggs_total}+{milk_total}+{baking_soda_total}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}.
